text:
Hello everyone, I am facing an issue of missing the "screenshotPath" field while validating my theme locally, can someone tell me how to resolve this issue.
Hello everyone, I am facing an issue of Failed to fetch dependencies for my css and template files, can someone tell me how to resolve this issue.
Is there a way to get a recent post tag? IE on a single blog page you have 3 recents posts underneath the main post. Can I get the tags for the related posts?

is there anyway for me to not use the standard_header_includes og tags or at least edit the og tags it auto generates?

I need to pass a dynamic og:title tag that pulls data from an external api and since facebook will not allow dynamic injection with js is there a way to use hubl to access an external api and set the og:title content to the returned api content?
